transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes, sir. Mr. Kalyan from Medcon Engineering Building System, sir?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Kalyan sir, very good evening. Pravesh Sharma this side from IndiaMART from office Noida. Is it the right time to speak to you?
Customer: Please call tomorrow please. I am driving please.
Executive: When shall I call you, sir? When shall I call you?
Customer: Tomorrow, tomorrow.
Executive: Tomorrow?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Okay, sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is driving.

- Wants a call back tomorrow.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call back tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, driving
